labels.name: feature
labels.value: As a Waiter, I want to be able to manage reservations so I could control workload of the Restaurant.

labels.name: story
labels.value: Verify if a table that is once booked is no more shown in the available slots of the location for that date

labels.name: suite
labels.value: As a Waiter, I want to be able to manage reservations so I could control workload of the Restaurant.

labels.name: testClass
labels.value: Verify if a table that is once booked is no more shown in the available slots of the location for that date

labels.name: package
labels.value: src.test.resources.features.api.BookingByWaiter_feature.As a Waiter, I want to be able to manage reservations so I could control workload of the Restaurant.

name: Verify if a table that is once booked is no more shown in the available slots of the location for that date

steps.name: Given the waiter is logged in
When the waiter sends a POST request to the end point for booking a table "table-204" for "5" people from "12:15" to "13:45" at location "location-002" and for customer "David Jack"
Then the response status-code must be 200
And then waiter send a GET request to the bookings table end point for that "location-002" and for number of guests "5"
Then validate if the slot for "table-104" from "12:15" to "13:45" is present or not
